newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia peso unchanged at 1,098.5 vs dlr.
newsitem.headline: Colombia peso unchanged at 1,098.5 vs dlr.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed at 1,098.5 against the dollar, unchanged from the previous day's close, in even trading Thursday.
"There was some speculation from banks and some petro-dollars and sugar export earnings were pumped into the market," one dealer said.

The peso opened at 1,097.6 and rose to an intraday high of 1,096.55 before sinking to a low of 1,099.1. Dealers reported 407 trades worth a total $213 million, above the daily average of about $180 million.
